at_bat.description: Steve Pearce grounds out to third base, Miguel Andujar to Neil Walker.
Teoscar Hernandez lines out to shortstop to Didi Gregorius.
Yangervis Solarte flies out to deep left field to Brett Gardner.
Brett Gardner grounds out to second base, Lourdes Gurriel to Steve Pearce.
Aaron Judge grounds out to shortstop, Aledmys Diaz to Steve Pearce.
Didi Gregorius walks.
Giancarlo Stanton reaches on a fielder's choice to shortstop. Didi Gregorius out at second.
Kendrys Morales strikes out swinging.
Kevin Pillar flies out to right field to Aaron Judge.
Luke Maile grounds out to shallow infield, Jordan Montgomery to Neil Walker.
Aaron Hicks grounds out to first base to Steve Pearce.
Neil Walker grounds out to second base, Lourdes Gurriel to Steve Pearce.
Miguel Andujar grounds out to second base, Lourdes Gurriel to Steve Pearce.
Aledmys Diaz singles to shortstop.
Randal Grichuk walks. Aledmys Diaz to second.
Lourdes Gurriel reaches on a fielder's choice to second base. Randal Grichuk out at second. Aledmys Diaz to third.
Steve Pearce walks. Lourdes Gurriel to second.
Teoscar Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Yangervis Solarte pops out to shallow left field to Didi Gregorius.
Austin Romine called out on strikes.
Ronald Torreyes grounds out to shortstop, Aledmys Diaz to Steve Pearce.
Brett Gardner walks.
Aaron Judge homers to left field. Brett Gardner scores.
Didi Gregorius flies out to deep center field to Kevin Pillar.
Kendrys Morales singles to center field.
Kevin Pillar strikes out swinging.
Luke Maile pops out to shallow center field to Ronald Torreyes.
Aledmys Diaz lines out to third base to Miguel Andujar.
Giancarlo Stanton strikes out swinging.
Aaron Hicks flies out to deep center field to Kevin Pillar.
Neil Walker strikes out swinging.
Randal Grichuk walks.
Lourdes Gurriel singles to left field, advances to 2nd. Randal Grichuk to third.
Steve Pearce singles to shallow left field. Lourdes Gurriel to third. Randal Grichuk scores.
Teoscar Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Yangervis Solarte flies out to right field to Aaron Judge.
Kendrys Morales reaches on a fielder's choice to shortstop. Steve Pearce out at second.
Miguel Andujar singles to right field.
Austin Romine grounds out to shallow infield. Miguel Andujar out at second.
Ronald Torreyes strikes out swinging.
Kevin Pillar grounds out to shortstop, Didi Gregorius to Neil Walker.
Luke Maile strikes out swinging.
Aledmys Diaz grounds out to shortstop, Didi Gregorius to Neil Walker.
Brett Gardner singles to left field.
Aaron Judge walks.
Didi Gregorius singles to right field. Aaron Judge to third. Brett Gardner scores.
Giancarlo Stanton walks.
Aaron Hicks reaches on a fielder's choice to shallow infield. Giancarlo Stanton to second. Didi Gregorius to third. Aaron Judge scores. Fielding error by Luke Maile.
Neil Walker called out on strikes.
